attributeDefs.name: version
attributeDefs.description: The version of the deployable artifact that defines the stream

attributeDefs.name: sourceArtifactName
attributeDefs.description: The name of the deployable artifact that contains the stream

attributeDefs.name: applicationId
attributeDefs.description: The application.id that the stream is configured with

attributeDefs.name: cluster
attributeDefs.description: The kafka cluster where the topic is defined

attributeDefs.name: database
attributeDefs.description: The database where the table resides.

entityDefs.name: kafka_topic
entityDefs.description: A topic that is defined within Kafka

attributeDefs.name: cluster
attributeDefs.description: The kafka cluster where the topic is defined

attributeDefs.name: topicName
attributeDefs.description: The name given to the topic and is used by producers and consumers

attributeDefs.name: createTime
attributeDefs.description: The time at which Atlas became aware of this topic

attributeDefs.name: keySchema
attributeDefs.description: The Avro schema that defines the key data found in messages that are a part of this topic.

attributeDefs.name: valueSchema
attributeDefs.description: The Avro schema that defines the payload data found in messages that are a part of this topic.

entityDefs.name: kafka_cluster
entityDefs.description: A kafka cluster which can contain many brokers.

attributeDefs.name: clusterName
attributeDefs.description: The name of the cluster which is used to commonly refer to it.

attributeDefs.name: location
attributeDefs.description: Describes where the cluster is located, may be a datacenter for example.
